title: Spinach and Broccoli Terrine

preparations.content: Oil a large terrine mould then set aside.

Place water in mixing bowl and insert simmering basket. Weigh broccoli into basket then place Varoma dish into position and weigh spinach into Varoma dish. Cover Varoma then steam <b>20 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.
Once vegetables are cooked, set Varoma and simmering basket aside and discard steaming water.
Place cream and agar-agar in mixing bowl and heat <b>3 min/100°C/speed 2<b>.
Add feta and goats cheese and mix <b>50 sec/speed 3<b>.

Add broccoli, drained spinach, salt and pepper and mix <b>30 sec//speed 3<b>. Transfer to prepared mould and cover with cling film. Allow to cool before placing in fridge to set for at least 4 hours.
Remove from mould before serving cold.

hintsAndTricks: Serve with a Thermomix chopped salad or mixed, dressed salad leaves.
